title: Himi 50
lyrics:
4-6 & 2-8s
1.
Ko kimoutolu na
Kuo mou lava’i,
Hono Laumālie
Ke mou mo’ui ai;
‘O fai fakaalafia
Ki homou ‘Eiki ko Sīsū.
2.
‘E vave homou hū
‘I he fu’u matapā,
Pea mou mo’ui
Mo homou ‘Otua;
Mama’o mei he mamahi
‘I he fiefia lahi.
3.
Pea ke tau fai
Ke tau fakaongo,
Ki he me’a lea
Kuo faka’ilo;
Ko hono faka’ilonga
Ki he kakai ‘oku tui.
4.
Ke tau fa’a vakai
Ki he hā’ele mai,
‘A e ‘Eiki lelei
‘Ofa ke ne ‘ilo
‘I he’ene hā’ele mai
‘Oku tau tali teu pē. *
